name: 黃耀宗
objective:
授課目標：1.培養自我健身及鍛鍊體能之能力，提高對健身運動之興趣，養成終身運動習慣。 2.藉由羽球運動基 本技術，讓學生體會運動效果，提昇對運動技能之能力。 3.藉由練習、比賽與同學互動，培養學生團 隊合作精神。 1. Training Self physical fitness and the ability of exercise to improve fitness of interest, to develop lifelong exercise habits. 2. By badminton basic skills to enable students to experience motion effects, enhance the ability of the motor skills of. 3. With exercises, interactive games with classmates, students team spirit.
授課大綱： 1.介紹羽球發展史及組織。 2.單、雙打規則及基本技術認知。 3.正手發球、正手擊長球；正手右切 球、正手左切球。 4.反手發球、反手擊長球、反手挑高球。 5.羽球比賽練習、測驗。 1. Introduction badminton history and organization. 2. Single, doubles rules and basic technical knowledge. 3. forehand serve, forehand hit the long ball; the ball is in hand to cut the right, left and cut the ball in hand. 4. backhand serve, backhand hit the long ball, backhand lob. 5. badminton tournament practice test.
schedule:
Week 1　　教學計畫、授課大綱、成績評量標準、上課要求…等說明。
Teaching plan, teaching outline, performance assessment criteria, school requirements ... etc instructions.
Week 2　　球拍握法與站法等基本技術練習
Racket grip and stop method basic technical exercises
Week 3　　前場球打法--挑球/高遠球 Forecourt--Lift/Clear
Week 4　　前場球打法--網前球及技巧 Forecourt--Net Shot and Skill
Week 5　　中場球打法--封網 Midcourt--Block
Week 6　　中場球打法--平抽/推  Midcourt--Side Drive Shot
Week 7　　正手拍挑球/高遠球 Forehand Lift/Clear
Week 8　　反手拍挑球/高遠球 Backhand Lift/Clear
Week 9　　期中測驗 Mid-term test
Week 10　　發長球/ Long serve
Week 11　　發短球/平高球 Short serve/Flat Flick serve
Week 12　　後場切球Rearcourt--Drop shot
Week 13　　後場切球練習 Rearcourt--Drop shot exercises
Week 14　　後場殺球 Rearcourt--Smash
Week 15  後場接殺球Rearcourt-- Return / Receive a smash
Week 16　　全場步伐練習 Overall the pace of practice
Week 17　　綜合測驗、單打比賽練習 Comprehensive practice、Singles match practice
Week 18　　期末測驗  Final exam
scorePolicy:
